name: GLADIATOR: Debuff Adventures (alternativemaster, jabich)
description:
You are a gladiator. You are forced to fight in the arena day after day, defeating other warriors, but in order to free yourself, you must prove your strength in an unequal battle. 

So, can you last 7 weeks or will you die sooner? But keep in mind, with each passed week, it will be more and more difficult for you. Broken legs, severed hands, hunger, cold, disease - everything will prevent you from moving forward.

 Will you become an everyone's hero, or will you die from the sword of a slave like you?

 You decide!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows - movement;
  • Q and E/Scroll - change weapons;
  • LMB - hit/shot;
  • LShift - dash;
